website_summaries.verdict: This Iron Man-approved wetsuit is designed for open water and great for all skill levels.
pros: HiFlex silicone panels along the side for maximum glide
Easy on and off features for fast transition
cons: This is the most expensive suit on our list

customer_reviews.title: Excellent suit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help keep me warm in cold water. Even without sleeves it keeps me warm, although I am not swimming in sub zero waters. It does take some doing to get the suit on but once you get the hang of it it’s easy going. Also, I am a plus size and was concerened that the WX would not fit but it fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey J.

customer_reviews.title: Great suit with one exception.
customer_reviews.text: Great product description. Ordered size based on size chart and fits perfectly. I used it a few times training for my first 70.3 Ironman in both fresh water and salt water. Performed as expected in both water conditions. Was easy to get into and out of during my Ironman in Santa Cruz Sept. 10th, 2017. I wish the front of the neckline were lower, as it feels too tight around my neck, but I get used to in once in the water. With a lower neckline, it would've gotten a 5 rating.
customer_reviews.author: Tyree

customer_reviews.title: ... switching to this bc the fit was so much better. I am 5'9"
customer_reviews.text: I previously had a Zoot women's sleeveless tri-suit but ended up switching to this bc the fit was so much better. I am 5'9", 145 lbs and I bought a size W2. I use it in Olympic distance tri's. My weakest event of a tri is the swim part and this suit def helped with the buoyancy. It also slides right on and right off {which was the polar opposite of my Zoot suit, I couldn't get that one off!}. I am so pleased with this purchase and would highly recommend this suit.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Burns

customer_reviews.title: Super soft and comfortable wetsuit
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable suit, soft neoprene but not fragile. Goes on easily, neck isn’t too tight. Feels lightweight but still gives buoyancy. Only reason it’s not a 5 is that seams are not smooth, a bit warped and bumpy but it doesn’t seem to affect suit performance.
customer_reviews.author: xcskimom

customer_reviews.title: Comfy for my broad swimmer's shoulders!
customer_reviews.text: I had trouble finding my size on other online sites and wanted a sleeveless wetsuit for open water swims and sprint triathalons. I'm 5'7" and have broad swimmer's shoulders, and ordered a W3 as suggested. The neckline was very comfortable and I did get a little chaffed by my hairline. Will apply glide product there next time. I swam in the SF bay and was pleasantly surprised by the flexibility I felt in the upper body and the buoyancy of my lower body! I'm very pleased with this wetsuit and highly recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wetsuit at the very last minute for the Chicago Triathlon this year. I wasn't sure if I should order the W1 or W2, as my weight was a few pounds over the W1 parameters, but based on another review I chose W1. I was fluctuating from around 145-148 at the time, and I am 5'4 1/2". I didn't have a chance to practice with the suit in the water prior to the race, but it felt great and felt like a second skin. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit!  Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: This triathlon wetsuit fits true to size - easy to get on and off. I use this 3mm suit in Lake Superior 45 - 55 degree water and I feel very comfortable -- some days almost too warm. Very glad I purchased this suit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Most amazing wetsuit ever!
customer_reviews.text: So amazing!! I used this for my Tri, great arm freedom and best of if all, easy to put on (Not even "for a wet suit"!). I was the envy of ppl at the race, slid it on, zipped it up and immediately was comfortable. No issues, including the neck section. No rubbing or chaffing. Even after the swim portion. Pretty easy to get off. No complaints at all!
customer_reviews.author: mel

customer_reviews.title: I swam in it in the open water for the first time today and it was awesome! The suit is very comfortable to swim in
customer_reviews.text: This is the first wetsuit I have purchased. I tried it on dry (before swimming in it) three times. The first time I put it on, the wetsuit seemed too small. After reading the directions of how to put on the wetsuit, I do not think I had pulled the suit up far enough before putting my arms in. I also think I am not accustomed to how snug a wetsuit should fit. I swam in it in the open water for the first time today and it was awesome! The suit is very comfortable to swim in. I am 5'6" and weigh about 140lbs and bought a W2.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This one fit my body the best! I like the thin material around the neck
customer_reviews.text: This my first wet suit. I ordered several different brands at the same time so I could try them on. This one fit my body the best! I like the thin material around the neck. It didn't feel constricting, in fact I barely noticed I had it on in the water. I also like the opening for the arms. I had big range of motion, which was great while swimming. The material was very supple and comfortable, no hot spots. Also, the design is super cute. If I'm gonna look like a stuffed sausage, I might as well be cute! LOL! For reference, I am 5'4" 175 and I ordered size W3 - M
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great for longer torso women.
customer_reviews.text: The material was great. The fit was an issue. The torso was WAY too long. Fit everywhere else. So I wore it out thinking no big deal. Since the torso was so long water leaked in and I got soaked and heavy. Otherwise it was a great suit.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Grayber

customer_reviews.title: Synergistic!
customer_reviews.text: Synergy wetsuits are very well constructed and this one, the Endorphin Sleeveless, is no exception. For reference regarding size, I am 5'2.5", 126 lbs and generally a 34DDD or 36DD. The P3 works very well for me; a perfect snug fit.
customer_reviews.author: shbowa

customer_reviews.title: Do not look further
customer_reviews.text: An excellent wetsuit! I bought sleeveless and a long sleeve . Both are great and fit me perfect. I am a happy swimmer now! I think my hubby wants to have one as well.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Followed the guidelines and the fit was perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous to order a wetsuit online, but I read through the directions for sizing carefully and I was so happy the wetsuit fit perfectly! I'm 5'8 and fluctuate between 150-160 lbs. I ordered W3 and am so glad. It is totally tight enough, but not restricting. I just wore it in my first triathlon and it was really easy to get off during transition. I was so pleased that I didn't lose any time taking off the wetsuit. This is the only wetsuit I have ever owned, so it's hard to say if it performs better or worse than others, but I have no complaints and the price is great. My boyfriend said it looks sexy too!
customer_reviews.author: Nora

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tri wetsuit!
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised by this wetsuit! Ordered last minute for a sprint triathlon. I'm a very strong swimmer, so I wasn't too worried about the buoyancy, but this wetsuit was very buoyant. Had a great swim. Easy to get on and off, sizing chart was spot on, and the suit didn't rub anywhere. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: relatively easy to get in and out (easier than I expected)
customer_reviews.text: Order just in time to wear for a Sprint Tri without any time to "practice"; Fit well based on using the chart as a guide, relatively easy to get in and out (easier than I expected), LOVE the flexible material at neck. (I am claustrophobic and was concerned about feeling uncomfortable with neck/chest.) Very very comfortable...no places rub or restrict movement...did not need any practice time to adjust to it for swimming....immediately felt like "cheating" compared to swimming without a wet suit.
customer_reviews.author: IMPeg

customer_reviews.title: Fitx as expected
customer_reviews.text: Product is as described, fix well and it comes with very important usage instructions. Shipping and wrapping very secure.
customer_reviews.author: Randall B.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. The material is thinner than my xtera and mug more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good all-around wetsuit
customer_reviews.text: Swam this morning in it and it was very comfortable. Not too bad getting in and off and no neck chafing - yay! Other wetsuits feel tight and shoulders and neck on me but this one didn’t make me feel contstricted at all. Since I swam in warmer water, I can’t vouch for how warm it is, but I think if you swim in cold water you’re not wearing a sleeveless anyway.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome wetsuit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace an old wetsuit that was too tight. I was a little concerned about the sleeveless being too cold, but I actually didn't notice an issue at all and love the freedom from restriction that the sleeveless suit provides. The suit fit perfectly and performed as expected. I especially liked that it didn't choke my neck, like my last suit. I hope to get many years of use.
customer_reviews.author: denverdina

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this wetsuit. Easy on/off. Kept me warm and cut down my swim time!
customer_reviews.author: BluemontBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Great wetsuit at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Wore this for a tri in a mid 60s lake. It worked great! I love the no sleeves, the fit was perfect (I am 5'8" 145 lbs and I got a W2), and it came off super quick in transition. Perfect wetsuit for me for a reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly good fit, a little small in the bust but that's typically the case. Very smooth and easy to move around in -would be great for cold water! I think i'm going to go for the thinner suit next.
customer_reviews.author: ME now

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Last year I rented a wetsuit for my triathlon last year and it was a little big so I wanted to buy one this year. This fits exactly as described, is very comfortable and will be perfect for my upcoming race.
customer_reviews.author: Jemma Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Love this suit
customer_reviews.text: Love this suit, others I tried felt like they were choking me at the neck, this one felt awesome all over and as far as keeping me warm in the water......I never felt the icy water on my lake race, freaking awesome!!!
customer_reviews.author: Camie B.

customer_reviews.title: My wife already had the full sleeve and loved it so I bought her the sleeveless
customer_reviews.text: My wife already had the full sleeve and loved it so I bought her the sleeveless. I have a 700.00 wet suit and hers is better her head never goes under water I am so jealous of this. Hers worked so well that I bought one for myself and now were both like paddle boards.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for athletes!
customer_reviews.text: Although I returned this wetsuit, the quality and sizing were great. I was looking for more of a leisure style- and this one is definitely more athletic fitting. Side note—
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Just got into it and loved how easily it went on and came off
customer_reviews.text: Just got into it and loved how easily it went on and came off. Swimming in it was not constricting around the neck or legs so far it a good purchase decision.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Whittaker

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Love my new Synergy wetsuit. Only used 4 times so far in a lake. Previously used a full wetsuit but found that caused shoulder restriction so went for sleeveless and found it much more comfortable. I'm 5'8 135lbs and found the W2 a good fit for me. I am long in the torso so really like the cut of the leg as I can move it further up the calf for a comfortable fit. Easy to put on and easy to take off.
customer_reviews.author: Bikecrazygirl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit. Perfect form. Perfect function.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the suit to keep warm during my winter swim lessons at Stanford University. I also plan use the Synergy to do some SF Bay swimming and other open water swimming. The suit is perfect in form and function.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: I like the way the neck is designed to rest flat ...
customer_reviews.text: The wetsuit is fairly was to get on and off. I like the way the neck is designed to rest flat and comfortable around my neck.
customer_reviews.author: Double Dee

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: True to size, unlike TYR! Bought it for my 13 yr old daughter. She's 5-3 and 104 and the P2 is perfect. This is SO EASY to get on and off. We sent the CAT 5 back because it was terrible to get on and off. She is going to kill it in a 1.2 mile open water event in Oct. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, easy to get on!
customer_reviews.text: Love this wet suit. Great for cold open water swimming. Very comfortable. Great range of motion.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Russell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the fit! Exceeded my expectation and the price was spot on.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Franssen

customer_reviews.title: Everything was perfect. I really like the ease of getting the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my first tri-wetsuit. I was very concerned about the sizing and the effect in the water. I spent hours combing through information and reviews on tri-wetsuits. Everything was perfect. I really like the ease of getting the suit on and off and the buoyancy I get in the water. Great job Synergy!
customer_reviews.author: Red, NY

customer_reviews.title: Size chart was accurate.
customer_reviews.text: Fit well, size chart was accurate! Highly recommend! Good quality for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Great suit!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first wet suit. I love this suit as it does just what is expected and looks good too. Unlike my friends who have different brands, it is not hard to take off. I thought it was too tight around the neck when I got it, but it did expand in the water the first time and now it is not an issue. Very positive.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great wetsuit. I am 5'1'' & 120lbs
customer_reviews.text: Great wetsuit. I am 5'1'' & 120lbs, I purchased a P3 and it fits just right. Easy to get on and off and keeps you buoyant.
customer_reviews.author: LSUTIger09

customer_reviews.title: Suit is wonderful but I did have chafing on my neck come ...
customer_reviews.text: Use size chart on synergy website! Suit is wonderful but I did have chafing on my neck come race day, even thought suit for perfectly otherwise!
customer_reviews.author: Hilary

customer_reviews.title: I was very pleased with my first wetsuit
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with my first wetsuit. I wore it in a triathlon last weekend. The velcro at the neck was a little hard to undo, but otherwise i love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lanna Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to expensive brands!
customer_reviews.text: I've completed two triathlons with rented Blueseventy suits, but figured it was time to buy my own. This wetsuit was much more affordable and I didn't notice any major differences from the more premium suits. The fit was great and it did the job it was supposed to do!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a comfortable and efficient suit
customer_reviews.text: This is a comfortable and efficient suit. It fits well and is easy to get on and off which is important for triathlons. I'm 5'7 170ish pounds and W3 fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Richards

customer_reviews.title: Love this wetsuit
customer_reviews.text: Love this wetsuit. I'm 5'4" and 140 pounds - ordered a W2 and it fits perfectly! All the other brands I tried were way too long - this is just right. Feels great in the water as well.
customer_reviews.author: MEL

customer_reviews.title: This way better fit and room to move my arms while in ...
customer_reviews.text: This way better fit and room to move my arms while in water. Way better than the long sleeve one I previously ordered.
customer_reviews.author: bola adeaga

customer_reviews.title: Pretty easy to get on as far as wetsuits goes
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to get on as far as wetsuits goes. I'm 5'11" and it first me lengthwise which is always nice. I will swim in it for the first time this weekend. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: KMWDC

customer_reviews.title: Open Water Swimming.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first wetsuit. I purchased it for an open water swim event. The fit of the wetsuit is great. It is extremely easy to get on an off. I am going to get one for my husband too.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: I recently purchased this product for my first triathlon. ...
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this product for my first triathlon. I am 5'8" and purchased the W2, it fits well and gives me the buoyancy in the water I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with it thus far
customer_reviews.text: Other than a borrowed suit, this was my first wetsuit purchase. It fits well. I am happy with it thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great wetsuit, great value
customer_reviews.text: My wife wore this wetsuit in a 1/2 ironman. Comfortable and provides decent buoyancy in fresh water. (Based on another customer's recommendation, she ordered W2 - she's 5'10 and 145 lbs. Fit great!)
customer_reviews.author: Tucker Sawin

customer_reviews.title: the W-2 was a good fit.
customer_reviews.text: This kept me toasty! Very buoyant too. I am 5'8" and 145 pounds, the W-2 was a good fit.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Hey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like the fit and the flatness on the neck area.....Have yet to try it in the water!
customer_reviews.author: Fiona

customer_reviews.title: Loved this wet suit
customer_reviews.text: Loved this wet suit, fits great and was easy to put on. It was a little tight around the neck but that is to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Agree with what all the others said! I had my best swim in a olympic tri last month.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Fit is perfect! Very happy with this
customer_reviews.text: This is everything I expected and more! Fit is perfect! Very happy with this wetsuit
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable wetsuit
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable wetsuit. Wore it this past weekend for my sprint triathlon in 70 degree water and it performed great! It was easy to put on and take off and I had no chafing. I'm very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: mommykins

customer_reviews.title: Got to have it!
customer_reviews.text: I have friends who suggested this. It is comfortable and perfect for open water swimming
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Delong

product_meta.title: Synergy Triathlon Wetsuit 5/3mm - Women's Endorphin Sleeveless Long John Smoothskin Neoprene for Open Water Swimming Ironman & USAT Approved
feature_bullets: SUITABLE FOR ALL LEVELS – Ironman & USAT approved. Athlete endorsed. Comes in wide range of sizes to ensure a perfect fit.
PROVEN TECHNOLOGY EQUALS SUPERIOR PERFORMANCE – Hydrodynamic neoprene made from Yamamoto #39 with SCS silicone coated SyPrene. 5mm thick core buoyancy panel / 3mm lower legs and back.

EXCEPTIONAL FUNCTIONALITY – Full range of motion. Unsurpassed 680 percent flexibility. Highest grade anti corrode internal wetsuit zipper from YKK which greatly reduces drag as you move through the water. Super soft low neck with smoothskin on both sides and because it is so soft, it feels like you hardly have anything around your neck.

MAXIMUM BUOYANCY - 5mm wetsuit, which is the maximum buoyancy allowed in triathlon wetsuits. Creates nearly double the buoyancy than 3mm suits, which are not recommended for cold waters. Float higher. Move faster. Save energy.

CUSTOMER SATISFACTION - 30-Day Guarantee: If you are not 100% satisfied within 30-days, send your new/unused wetsuit back for a full refund / 2 Year Warranty / Lifetime Replacement Guarantee (allows end-user to send in their used wetsuit at any time and receive 40% off MSRP).
